Gastritis is one of the common digestive diseases. The disease is often caused by infection with H.Pylori bacteria or irregular eating and unscientific nutrition. People with gastritis will have symptoms of epigastric pain, heartburn, belching and abdominal bloating. The disease can be completely treated with medication, the treatment regimen is short and not too complicated. However, patients need to pay attention to good digestive health to minimize the risk of complications or chronic gastritis.
